articles.description: Suryakumar Yadav, the world number one T20 batter, lauded the young Dewald Brevis for his knock of 162 off 57 balls during an CSA T20 Challenge game.

articles.title: Manchester United set to introduce ‘Cristiano Ronaldo’ rule to limit player salaries - The Indian Express
articles.description: Dubbed as the 'Ronaldo rule', the club will cap earnings to £200,000 a week.
